title: System76 refreshes Kudu Linux laptop with Ryzen 7 CPU and up to 64GB RAM
content:
System76 has been selling Linux-powered laptop and desktop computers for years, some of which are based on ODM designs, and some with original designs. Now the company has a brand new high-end workstation laptop ready for nearly everything you can throw at it, complete with full support for desktop Linux. System76 announced the new ‘Kudu’

The post System76 refreshes Kudu Linux laptop with Ryzen 7 CPU and up to 64GB RAM appeared first on xda-developers.
description: System76, a PC manufacteror that specalizes in Linux computers, is selling a new high-end laptop with a Ryzen CPU and RTX graphics.
